name: yeehaw
description: A StarMash extension to run JavaScript from the chat bar.

scripts.build: browserify --node yeehaw.js | babel -s inline --presets=es2015 | uglifyjs -cm > yeehaw.min.js
scripts.minify2: google-closure-compiler-js yeehaw.js --languageIn ES6 --compilationLevel ADVANCED --externs externs.js > yeehaw.min.js

author: STEAMROLLER
